question:
12. Berikut ini merupakan kalimat yang ditulis pada paragraf pembuka yang mengekspresikan sesuatu    tindakan yang telah dilakukan adalah ....
a. We very much regret to learn from your letter of ....
b. I have made enquiries about the cost of the repairs you mention in your letter of ....
C. I have studied with interest the literature you sent me with your letter of ....
d. We were sorry to learn from your letter of ....
e. I am sorry not to have been able to reply sooner to your letter of ...​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

B.

Penjelasan:

hope it helps, and the right answer◉‿◉
